page.title: 09Going to Church
page.content: My name is Nicola and I am a member of{Poulner Baptist Chapel}Girl Jucos, aged 10-12 years. We meet on a Sunday between 11a.m. and 12 noon for a Bible Quiz, notices, a story and a lesson. We have two leaders and a Minister called Mr. Carroll. At the{Trinity Church,}Timothy and Peter attend a service with hymns and prayers mid-morning then go into a small room for Sunday school where the teachers tell a story and give out leaflets and pictures to colour in. Vicky goes to the{Methodist Church} where her father is Minister. Besides a Sunday School there is a Junior Club on a Monday evening where the members make things and play games. Methodist Church members go on lots of outings and have sponsored events. Once a year there is a family weekend visit to{ {Swanage. }
